import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const CreatePost = (e) => { const [img, setImg] = useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [subTitle, setSubtitle] = useState(''); const [body, setBody] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date()); const onClickSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:5001/api/createPost', { img, title, subTitle, body, date }) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" />
setSubTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" />
setTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" />
setTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" />
setTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" />
) } export default CreatePost
